artist.description: Name of the artist that illustrated the card art.

borderColor.description: Color of the border. Can be black, borderless, gold, silver, or white.

colorIdentity.description: List of all colors in card’s mana cost, rules text and any color indicator.

colorIndicator.description: List of all colors in card’s color indicator (a symbol showing the colors of the card). Usually found only on cards without mana costs and other special cards.

colors.description: List of all colors in card’s mana cost and any color indicator. Some cards are special (such as Devoid cards or other cards with certain rules text).

convertedManaCost.description: The converted mana cost of the card.

duelDeck.description: If the card is in a duel deck product, can be "a"(left) or "b"(right). (If not in duel deck product, duelDeck is usually ommitted.)

faceConvertedManaCost.description: The converted mana cost of the face (half, or part) of the card.

flavorText.example: "Whatever hatred destroys, a single act of trust can revive."
flavorText.description: Italicized text found below the rules text that has no game function.

frameVersion.description: Version of the card frame style. Can be 1993, 1997, 2003, 2015, or future.

hand.description: Starting maximum hand size total modifier. A plus or minus character preceeds an integer. Used only on Vanguard cards.

hasFoil.description: Can the card be found in foil? Can be true or false. (If false, it is usually omitted.)

hasNonFoil.description: Can the card be found in non-foil? Can be true or false. (If false, it is usually omitted.)

isOnlineOnly.description: Is the card only available online? Can be true or false. (If false, it is usually omitted.)

isOversized.description: Is the card oversized? Can be true or false. (If false, it is usually omitted.)

isReserved.description: Is the card on the MTG Reserved List? Can be true or false. (If false, it is usually omitted.)

isStarter.description: If this card is found in a booster pack. (If false, it is usually omitted.)

isTimeshifted.description: Card is “timeshifted”, a feature from Time Spiral block. Can be true or false. (If false, it is usually omitted.)

layout.description: Type of card. Can be normal, split, flip, transform, meld, leveler, saga, planar, scheme, vanguard, token, double_faced_token, emblem, augment, or host. (If normal, it is usually omitted.)

life.description: Starting life total modifier. A plus or minus character preceeds an integer. Used only on Vanguard cards.

multiverseId.description: An integer most cards have which Wizards uses as a card identifier.

name.description: Name of the card. (If the card is in an Un-set and has multiple printings, a space and letter enclosed in parentheses, starting with (b), follows the name.)

names.example: ["Nicol Bolas, the Ravager","Nicol Bolas, the Arisen"]
names.description: Names of each face on the card. Meld cards are listed in the order of CardA, Meld, CardB.

originalText.example: "Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nDeathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)"
originalText.description: Text on the card as originally printed.

originalType.description: Type as originally printed. Includes any supertypes and subtypes. ("Legendary Creature — Angel")

printings.description: List of sets the card was printed in, in uppercase.

rarity.description: Rarity. Can be basic, common, uncommon, rare, or mythic

scryfallId.description: A universal unique id (v4) generated by Scryfall. Note that cards with multiple faces are not unique.

scryfallOracleId.description: A unique ID for this card’s oracle identity. This value is consistent across reprinted card editions, and unique among different cards with the same name (tokens, Unstable variants, etc).

scryfallIllustrationId.description: A unique identifier for the card artwork that remains consistent across reprints. Newly spoiled cards may not have this field yet.

side.description: Identifier of the side. Used on cards with multiple faces, such as flip, split, transform cards. Can be a, b, or c.

subtypes.description: List of card subtypes found after em-dash. ("Legendary Creature — Angel")

supertypes.description: List of card supertypes found before em-dash. ("Legendary Creature — Angel")

tcgplayerProductId.description: Numeric identifier for the card for TCGPlayer.

tcgplayerPurchaseUrl.description: URL which redirects to TCGPlayer website’s card page.

text.example: "Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nDeathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)"

type.description: Type of the card. Includes any supertypes and subtypes. ("Creature — Angel")

types.description: List of types of the card.

uuid.description: A universal unique id (v5) generated by MTGJSON. Each entry is unique.

uuidV421.description: Compatibility uuid for v4.3.0, but will support v4.2.1 to help people transition until v4.4.0.

variations.description: List of uuid id's of this card with alternate printings in the same set. Excludes Un-sets.

watermark.description: Name of the watermark on the card. If there isn’t one, it can be an empty string, but it is usually omitted.
